preScript:
!:INC PICK.SYSTEM-CONFIG.ZABBIX.DSC-WM-LATAM.INCL
!:INC READ.SYSTEM-CONFIG.ZABBIX.DSC-WM-LATAM.INCL
!
!:READ &ZABBIX_FULL_URL#,,,&SC_ZABBIX_FULL_URL#
!:READ &ZABBIX_USERNAME#,,,&SC_ZABBIX_USERNAME#
!:READ &ZABBIX_PASSWORD#,,,&SC_ZABBIX_PASSWORD#
!
!:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB
!
!:SET &RUNNR# = SYS_ACT_ME_NR()
!:SET &PNUM#  = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
!:IF &PNUM# = ''
!:  SET &PNUM# = &RUNNR#
!:ENDIF
!:SET &ZABBIX_REQUESTID# = FORMAT(&PNUM#)
!:PUBLISH &ZABBIX_REQUESTID#,,TASK
!
:DEFINE &AAGENT#,string,3
:FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(${IN_AGENT},".")
:SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:SET &AGENT# = "&AGENT_UC#.os"
:PUB &AGENT#

!:SET &LOGIN# = &IN_LOGIN#
!:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB

processingCommand.script:
!====================================== SHELL SCRIPT =====================================
echo ">> Hostname: $HOSTNAME"
echo ">> Executing: sudo su - ${IN_WMS_USER} -c \"/jda_scripts/zabbix/zabbix_automation/zabbix_close_maintenance_window.sh ${IN_M_ID}\""
echo ">> Script output: "
sudo su - ${IN_WMS_USER} -c "/jda_scripts/zabbix/zabbix_automation/zabbix_close_maintenance_window.sh ${IN_M_ID}"
EXITCODE=$?
if [[ $EXITCODE -eq 2 ]]; then
  EXITCODE=0
  echo ">> Warning: Script exited with exitcode 2!"
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
else
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
fi
exit $EXITCODE

!:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
